entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who is concerned about the legend of wands being passed from hand to hand by murder.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A dark wizard who is mentioned as having an idea to put into action.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A wand maker who is being questioned by Harry about the legend of wands.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: A magical stick used by wizards to cast spells.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned that Voldemort has decided to put his idea into action, which suggests a connection between the two characters.
Ollivander is a wand maker, which means he creates wands for wizards.
